name: KOMORU - A Deep in My Mind
name_original: KOMORU - A Deep in My Mind
description:
Komoru, from the Japanese "retreat", tells a story of the life of a young hikikomori. You will take on the role of Aiden, an Italian-American teenager who has decided to live in his room for several months now.


During the adventure you will have the opportunity to interact with different objects that will tell you more about his story and read his diary in which he delves into some specific points and in which you can empathize with his difficulties.

The ending is variable. You will find yourself faced with choices whose outcome will depend on how you deal with them. Pay close attention to your surroundings so you can tackle the story as best you can!
